members.name: activeFeatureToggleList
members.description: The list of active feature toggles to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: allowRules
members.description:
The list of rules for the content in the iframe, managed by the HTML `allow` attribute.
You can use one or more rules by adding them to the array, for example allowRules: ["microphone", "camera"].

members.name: anchor
members.description: The anchor value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: authData
members.description: The authData value to be passed to the iframe-based micro frontend.

members.name: clientPermissions
members.description: The clientPermissions to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: context
members.description: The stringified context object to be passed to the microfrontend.

members.name: deferInit
members.description: If set to true defers from initializing the microfronted automatically. In that case init() can be used.

members.name: dirtyStatus
members.description:
The dirty status value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.
It's used to indicate that there are unsaved changes when navigating away.

members.name: documentTitle
members.description: The document title value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: hasBack
members.description:
The hasBack value to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.
It indicates that there is one or more preserved views. Useful when you need to show a back button.

members.name: label
members.description: Label information for the microfrontend.

members.name: locale
members.description: The locale to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: noShadow
members.description: If set to true, the Luigi container webcomponent will not use the shadow DOM for rendering.

members.name: nodeParams
members.description: The parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: pathParams
members.description: The path parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: sandboxRules
members.description:
The list of rules for the content in the iframe, managed by the HTML `sandbox` attribute.
You can use one or more rules by adding them to the array, for example sandboxRules: ["allow-scripts", "allow-same-origin"].

members.name: searchParams
members.description: The search parameters to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: skipCookieCheck
members.description: If set to true, skips third party cookie check.

members.name: skipInitCheck
members.description: If set to true, skips handshake and ready event is fired immediately.

members.name: theme
members.description: The theme to be passed to the  web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: userSettings
members.description: The user settings to be passed to the web-component-based micro frontend.

members.name: viewurl
members.description: The URL of the microfrontend to be rendered.

members.name: webcomponent
members.description: Predicate that sets whether the microfrontend is to be rendered in a web component or not. It can also be an object with the attributes shown in a table below.

events.name: custom-message
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend sends a custom message.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object} @memberof Events @property {object} data - event data @property {string} id - event ID @example { data: {}, id: 'some-id' }

events.name: navigation-request
events.description: Event fired when a navigation has been requested by the micro frontend.  Payload: [NavigationRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {NavigationRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { fromClosestContext: false, fromContext: null, fromParent: true, fromVirtualTreeRoot: false, link: '/test/route', nodeParams: {} }

events.name: show-alert-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show an alert.  Read more about `showAlert` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-core-api?section=showalert).  Payload: [AlertRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {AlertRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { text: 'Custom alert message', type: 'info', links: { goToHome: { text: 'Homepage', url: '/overview' }, goToOtherProject: { text: 'Other project', url: '/projects/pr2' }, relativePath: { text: 'Hide side nav', url: 'hideSideNav' }, neverShowItAgain: { text: 'Never show it again', dismissKey: 'neverShowItAgain' } }, closeAfter: 3000 }

events.name: initialized
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend has been initialized. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: add-search-params-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests the addition of search parameters to the URL.  Payload: [ParamsRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ParamsRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { data: {}, keepBrowserHistory: false }

events.name: add-node-params-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests the addition of node parameters to the URL.  Payload: [ParamsRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ParamsRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { data: {}, keepBrowserHistory: false }

events.name: show-confirmation-modal-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show a confirmation modal.  Read more about `showConfirmationModal` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-core-api?section=showconfirmationmodal).  Payload: [ConfirmationModalRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ConfirmationModalRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { header: 'Confirmation', body: 'Are you sure you want to do this?', buttonConfirm: 'Yes', buttonDismiss: 'No' }

events.name: show-loading-indicator-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show a loading indicator. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: hide-loading-indicator-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to hide the loading indicator. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: set-current-locale-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the current locale.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, string>} @memberof Events @example { currentLocale: 'en' }

events.name: set-storage-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to modify the local storage.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, string>} @memberof Events @example { key: 'luigi-version', value: '2.21.0' }

events.name: runtime-error-handling-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to handle errors that might happen during the runtime of the micro frontend. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: set-anchor-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the anchor of the URL.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) @type {String} @memberof Events @example 'some-anchor'

events.name: set-third-party-cookies-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set third-party cookies. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: get-current-route-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests the current app route.  Payload: [CurrentRouteRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {CurrentRouteRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { fromClosestContext: false, fromContext: null, fromParent: true, fromVirtualTreeRoot: false, nodeParams: {} }

events.name: report-navigation-completed-request
events.description: Event fired to report that the micro frontend's navigation has completed. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: update-modal-path-data-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to update the modal path parameters.  Payload: [ModalPathDataRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ModalPathDataRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { fromClosestContext: false, fromContext: null, fromParent: true, fromVirtualTreeRoot: false, history: true, link: '/test/route', modal: { title: 'Some modal' }, nodeParams: {} }

events.name: update-modal-settings-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to update the modal settings.  Read more about `updateModalSettings` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-client-api?section=updatemodalsettings).  Payload: [ModalSettingsRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ModalSettingsRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { addHistoryEntry: true, updatedModalSettings: {} }

events.name: check-path-exists-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to check the validity of a path.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, string>} @memberof Events @example { link: '/test/route' }

events.name: set-dirty-status-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the 'dirty status' which, for example, avoids closing when there are any unsaved changes.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, boolean>} @memberof Events @example { dirty: true }

events.name: set-viewgroup-data-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the view group data.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, unknown>} @memberof Events @example { vg: 'some data' }

events.name: go-back-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to navigate back.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, unknown>} @memberof Events @example { ctx: 'some context' }

events.name: add-backdrop-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to display the backdrop. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: remove-backdrop-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to remove the backdrop. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: close-current-modal-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to close the current modal. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

members.name: activeFeatureToggleList
members.description: The list of active feature toggles to be passed to the compound microfrontend.

members.name: anchor
members.description: The anchor value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: clientPermissions
members.description: The clientPermissions to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: compoundConfig
members.description:
The configuration for the compound microfrontend.
Take a look at the [compound parameter](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/navigation-parameters-reference/?section=compound) for details.

members.name: context
members.description: The stringified context to be passed to the compound microfrontend.

members.name: deferInit
members.description: If set to true defers from initializing the microfronted automatically. In that case init() can be used.

members.name: dirtyStatus
members.description:
The dirty status value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.
It's used to indicate that there are unsaved changes when navigating away.

members.name: documentTitle
members.description: The document title value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: hasBack
members.description:
The hasBack value to be passed to the compound micro frontend.
It indicates that there is one or more preserved views. Useful when you need to show a back button.

members.name: locale
members.description: The locale to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: noShadow
members.description: If set to true, the Luigi compound container webcomponent will not use the shadow DOM for rendering.

members.name: nodeParams
members.description: The parameters to be passed to the compound micro frontend. Will not be passed to the compound children.

members.name: pathParams
members.description: The path parameters to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: searchParams
members.description: The search parameters to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: skipInitCheck
members.description: If set to true, skips handshake and ready event is fired immediately.

members.name: theme
members.description: The theme to be passed to the compound microfrontend.

members.name: userSettings
members.description: The user settings to be passed to the compound micro frontend.

members.name: viewurl
members.description: The URL used for the renderer.

members.name: webcomponent
members.description: The following properties can be set for the web component object. By default, the web component is set to true.

events.name: custom-message
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend sends a custom message.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object} @memberof Events @property {object} data - event data @property {string} id - event ID @example { data: {}, id: 'some-id' }

events.name: navigation-request
events.description: Event fired when a navigation has been requested by the micro frontend.  Payload: [NavigationRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {NavigationRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { fromClosestContext: false, fromContext: null, fromParent: true, fromVirtualTreeRoot: false, link: '/test/route', nodeParams: {} }

events.name: show-alert-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show an alert.  Read more about `showAlert` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-core-api?section=showalert).  Payload: [AlertRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {AlertRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { text: 'Custom alert message', type: 'info', links: { goToHome: { text: 'Homepage', url: '/overview' }, goToOtherProject: { text: 'Other project', url: '/projects/pr2' }, relativePath: { text: 'Hide side nav', url: 'hideSideNav' }, neverShowItAgain: { text: 'Never show it again', dismissKey: 'neverShowItAgain' } }, closeAfter: 3000 }

events.name: initialized
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend has been initialized. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: add-search-params-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests the addition of search parameters to the URL.  Payload: [ParamsRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ParamsRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { data: {}, keepBrowserHistory: false }

events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests the addition of node parameters to the URL. events.name: show-confirmation-modal-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show a confirmation modal.  Read more about `showConfirmationModal` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-core-api?section=showconfirmationmodal).  Payload: [ConfirmationModalRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ConfirmationModalRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { header: 'Confirmation', body: 'Are you sure you want to do this?', buttonConfirm: 'Yes', buttonDismiss: 'No' }

events.name: show-loading-indicator-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to show a loading indicator. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: hide-loading-indicator-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to hide the loading indicator. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: set-current-locale-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the current locale.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, string>} @memberof Events @example { currentLocale: 'en' }

events.name: set-storage-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to modify the local storage. events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to handle errors that might happen during the runtime of the micro frontend. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.name: set-anchor-request
events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set the anchor of the URL.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) @type {String} @memberof Events @example 'some-anchor'

events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to set third-party cookies. @type {unspecified} (type is not relevant in this case) @memberof Events

events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to update the modal path parameters.  Payload: [ModalPathDataRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ModalPathDataRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { fromClosestContext: false, fromContext: null, fromParent: true, fromVirtualTreeRoot: false, history: true, link: '/test/route', modal: { title: 'Some modal' }, nodeParams: {} }

events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to update the modal settings.  Read more about `updateModalSettings` params [here](https://docs.luigi-project.io/docs/luigi-client-api?section=updatemodalsettings).  Payload: [ModalSettingsRequestPayload](https://github.com/luigi-project/luigi/blob/main/container/typings/constants/event-payloads.ts) @type {ModalSettingsRequestPayload} @memberof Events @example { addHistoryEntry: true, updatedModalSettings: {} }

events.description: Event fired when the micro frontend requests to check the validity of a path.  Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, string>} @memberof Events @example { link: '/test/route' }

Payload: [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) @type {Object.<string, boolean>} @memberof Events @example { dirty: true }
